summary: Breezehome that is no longer that much bigger on the inside. Additional small changes include another bookshelf, chest, two weaponracks, better looking bed after upgrade, main room redesign to make Breezehome look more roomy and i also added enchanting table. Best of all, Lydia knows her place.
descriptionHtml:
----------------------------------------------------
Warning!

This mod has compatibility issues with many mods that somehow affect Breezehome! Download at your own risk.

----------------------------------------------------
Update:

Fixed the mesh issues, will be adding compatibility fixes for reported conflicting mods!

----------------------------------------------------
Introduction:

This mod is for those that were bothered by the fact that Breezehome is \"longer\" on the inside and does not have same shape as on the outside. It also makes the house slightly better so you can have it as your main house even if you are higher level. The House is equiped of course depending on the upgrades you buy.

And big thanks to everyone that reports compatibility glitches to me! 

----------------------------------------------------
List of changes:

-Made the Breezehome \"shorter\" on the inside to have the same shape as on the outside.

-This led to replacement of firepit with fireplace. Its position depend on which file you download. Main file is more realistic.

-Added bookcase upstairs

-Added two weaponracks

-Added enchanting table

-Lydia now does not go into your bedroom

-Removed most of the \"dream catchers\" and \"wall bowls\". It makes the house look more roomy. Also i hate them with burning passion.

-Made slight decorative additions.

-When you upgrade bedroom, you get nicer bed.

-I personaly stole all the sweet rolls.
----------------------------------------------------
Warning!

Remember to clean up changed areas if you have already moved into your breezehome!
May not be compatible with mods that change Breezehome, especialy ones that use part of the house that was cut.
Added fix for those that use Fast Map Travel from INSIDE your House by Debz with this mod.
----------------------------------------------------

How to Install:
Just unzip the TheClone Breezehome.esp file to your Skyrim/Data folder. Make sure that the plugin is check in when you start the launcher and choose your data files.

----------------------------------------------------
author: TheClone

files.name: House fast travel mod compatibility fix
